description: As the day approaches night and a full moon illuminates the town, a strange energy emanates from the sky. All of a sudden all the civilians have disappeared and barbarians are running around destroying everything around them. Four warriors, O Hara from the wolf clan, Kang Chihwan from the bear clan, Sonic from the leopard clan, and Wang Kanghan from the human clan are all searching for their families and the rest of their clan members while destroying all the barbarians that stand in their way. Little do they know all the surprises that are in store for them... Let the game begin!
